name: Pac-Man (itch) (giantgummybear)
description:
My implementation of Pac-Man submitted to Swansea University for CSC384 Introduction to Video Games Programming module

Running the game

After extracting the file, execute cs-384-assignment to run the game.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to move, Enter to select, Tab to pause

Uninstalling the game

You can just delete all the files that you extracted to remove the game. To completely remove the save data in your computer, please delete the directory as the following: "%userprofile%\AppData\LocalLow\DefaultCompany\cs-384-assignment"
